statusLine.command: input=$(cat); cwd=$(echo "$input" | jq -r '.workspace.current_dir'); dir_name=$(basename "$cwd"); printf '\033[1;32m➜ \033[0m \033[36m%s\033[0m' "$dir_name"; cd "$cwd" 2>/dev/null && if git rev-parse --git-dir > /dev/null 2>&1; then branch=$(git symbolic-ref --short HEAD 2>/dev/null || git rev-parse --short HEAD 2>/dev/null); if [ -n "$branch" ]; then printf ' \033[1;34mgit:(\033[0m\033[31m%s\033[0m\033[34m)\033[0m' "$branch"; if ! git diff --no-ext-diff --quiet --no-optional-locks 2>/dev/null || ! git diff --cached --no-ext-diff --quiet --no-optional-locks 2>/dev/null; then printf ' \033[33m✗\033[0m'; fi; fi; fi; printf '\n'
